settings.title: Electrolytes for Dehydration
settings.text:
Dehydration can sneak up on you and affect how you feel and function. While water is important, sometimes you need a bit more. That's where electrolytes come in. But many electrolyte solutions out there are filled with sugar and additives.

Enter Buoy: our sugar-free hydration drops are designed specifically for those who want effective hydration without the extras.

‚úì Recognizing Dehydration
‚úì The Importance Of Electrolytes
‚úì What To Look For In An Electrolyte Solution
‚úì The Problem With Sugar In Hydration Products
‚úì Our Electrolyte Solution

Plus, a sneak peek of our favorite electrolyte to prevent and reverse dehydration symptoms!

settings.title: üí¶ The Importance of Staying Hydrated
settings.text: Water is vital. It's involved in almost every function in our body‚Äîfrom digestion and absorption to maintaining the balance of bodily fluids and regulating body temperature. When we're dehydrated, these processes get compromised.

settings.title: üå° Signs and Symptoms of Dehydration
settings.text: Dehydration isn't always obvious. Beyond thirst, signs include dark urine, fatigue, dizziness, and confusion. Severe dehydration can also lead to rapid heartbeat and accelerated breathing, among other symptoms.

settings.title: üíß Causes of Dehydration
settings.text: It's not just about not drinking enough water. Other causes include excessive sweating, fever, frequent urination, and more. Even certain medications can cause dehydration.

settings.title: üçπ Rehydration: More Than Just Water
settings.text:
Rehydrating is about more than just drinking water. Your body loses salts and minerals when it gets dehydrated. These need to be replaced too. That‚Äôs where electrolytes come in.

Dehydration can sneak up on you, and its impact can be severe. Regularly monitoring your hydration levels and ensuring you're not only drinking water but also replenishing lost electrolytes, can keep you feeling at your best. Don't underestimate the power of proper hydration!

settings.title: Beyond Thirst: The Subtle Signs of Dehydration
settings.text:
Dehydration isn‚Äôt always announced with a parched throat or an overwhelming thirst. Many symptoms are silent, slowly sneaking up, making it crucial to be vigilant about your body‚Äôs hydration needs.

üß† Reduced Cognitive Function

Mental fog isn‚Äôt just tied to lack of sleep or stress. If you're struggling to think clearly or remember details, your body might be subtly signaling its need for hydration.

üò¥ Unexplained Fatigue

Feeling unusually tired, even after a good night's rest? Dehydration can sap your energy, making you feel sluggish and weary.

üò† Irritability And Mood Swings

Yes, your hydration level can impact your mood. When dehydrated, you might find yourself more irritable or experiencing mood fluctuations.

ü•µ Overheating

Sweat is our body‚Äôs natural cooling system. Without enough fluids, it can't regulate temperature effectively, leading to overheating even in mild conditions.

üç´ Unexplained Cravings

Suddenly craving salty or sweet snacks? It could be your body's way of signaling a need for electrolytes and hydration.

üöΩ Dark Urine

The color of your urine is a telltale sign. Dark yellow or amber signals dehydration, while a light lemonade color indicates you're well-hydrated.

settings.title: Dive Into Dehydration
settings.subtext:
Dehydration is not just about feeling thirsty. It's a serious concern that can affect every cell and system in your body, leading to a range of health issues.

It's essential to listen to your body and recognize these silent signs. Before reaching for a coffee or snack, consider if water and electrolytes might be the answer you're looking for. Stay hydrated, stay aware, and prioritize your health.

settings.title: Beyond H2O: The Complete Hydration Formula
settings.list: While water is a fundamental pillar of hydration, simply guzzling gallons isn't always the answer to dehydration. To truly hydrate our bodies and maintain fluid balance, we also need a mix of essential minerals: electrolytes. They play a pivotal role in ensuring our cells can send and receive signals, helping us function optimally.

settings.title: Electrolyte Essentials: Your Mini-Guide
settings.list:
üîã Sodium (Na+)

The primary player in maintaining fluid balance. Sodium helps regulate blood volume and blood pressure. Too little or too much can lead to cramping, dizziness, or more severe complications.

üçå Potassium (K+)

Works closely with sodium to maintain cell function and contribute to muscle contractions, nerve impulses, and heart rhythms. It's the secret sauce to preventing muscle cramps and fatigue.

üíé Calcium (Ca2+)

Beyond its role in bone health, calcium is crucial for muscle movement and nerve communication. It's also vital for blood clotting and releasing certain hormones.

üîç Magnesium (Mg2+)

A multitasker mineral! It's involved in muscle contractions, nerve function, enzyme activation, and even helps produce energy. Feeling fatigued? You might need more magnesium.

üåü Chloride (Cl‚àí)

Partnered with sodium, chloride helps keep the amount of fluid inside and outside of your cells in balance. It's also essential for digestion.

üí° Bicarbonate (HCO3‚àí)

This electrolyte is a pH regulator, making sure our blood remains at the right pH level. It also aids in digestive processes.

settings.title: Purity In Every Drop
settings.text: At Buoy, we believe that nature knows best. That's why we're committed to harnessing the purest and most effective natural ingredients in our hydration solutions. Every drop of our products reflects our dedication to quality, ensuring that you receive nothing but the best. No compromises, just nature's finest working for you.

settings.title: Quick Hydration, Naturally
settings.text: Why turn to artificial additives when nature offers the perfect solution? With Buoy, you're not just getting hydration‚Äîyou're getting fast-acting, efficient hydration the way nature intended. Our products are expertly formulated to give your body the rapid relief it craves without any artificial nasties. Experience the natural difference with Buoy and feel revitalized in record time!
settings.link_text: Try the Cleanest Electrolytes On Earth

settings.title: Chronic Illness Creators
settings.text: For Summer 22, we‚Äôre investing only in creators with chronic conditions. These talented creators are often tokenized, unpaid and under-represented and it‚Äôs time they got their bag.

Rehydrating is about more than just drinking water. Your body loses salts and minerals when it gets dehydrated. These need to be replaced too. That‚Äôs where electrolytes come in.

Dehydration can sneak up on you, and its impact can be severe. Regularly monitoring your hydration levels and ensuring you're not only drinking water but also replenishing lost electrolytes, can keep you feeling at your best. Don't underestimate the power of proper hydration!

settings.title: ‚úÖ Sugar Free Hydration
settings.text:
High sugar counts, especially from processed forms, can mitigate effective hydration and physical performance with long-term use.

While you can make the case for a tiny amount of glucose for hydration, Buoy's sugar-free electrolyte drops are packed with sodium co-transporters like potassium and B vitamins that help your body absorb sodium faster than it normally would.

settings.title:
The Electrolyte Edge

Beyond H2O: The Complete Hydration Formula
settings.text_bottom: Losing just 2% of fluids and key electrolytes can significantly impair physical performance. When you exercise, you lose 6 to 10%.

settings.title: My Go-To For Everyday Hydration
settings.content: I use Buoy multiple times every day and love it! It keeps me hydrated and feeling healthy.

settings.title: Hydration From The Kitchen
settings.text:
Nature‚Äôs Hydration Pack

Our kitchen is packed with natural sources of hydration. Foods like cucumbers, watermelons, oranges, and coconut aren't just delicious; they're packed with water and essential electrolytes that our bodies need. These foods do more than quench your thirst. They help balance your body's electrolyte levels, ensuring you stay energized and alert.

When Food Isn‚Äôt Enough

While many foods offer hydration and electrolytes, relying solely on them might not cut it, especially during times of severe dehydration or heavy physical exertion. Our body can lose fluids and minerals faster than food can replenish them under these conditions.

Plus, contemporary farming methods and water processing can diminish the electrolyte content in what we consume. That's when hydrating supplements like Buoy step in to quickly and efficiently restore balance.

The main cause of leg cramps is having low electrolyte and mineral levels.

Electrolytes‚Äîspecifically sodium, potassium, chloride and magnesium‚Äîare essential to proper muscle functions like contractions and repair.

If you're not replenishing them often throughout the day, you'll be at higher risk for leg cramps, especially at night when they can be the most disruptive.

Without an adequate balance of electrolytes and fluids, your muscles can't properly relax.

Replenishing fluids and electrolytes throughout the morning, afternoon and late evening, especially for people leading an active lifestyle, is a great way to prevent leg cramps.

When stressed or feeling anxious, our muscles tense up and become rigid, which can lead to muscle cramping.

While anxiety and stress are hard to control, having plenty of electrolytes and fluids in your body allows your body to handle excess levels of cortisol better than it would without.

Poor posture and overworking muscle groups may restrict blood flow, which is a common cause of leg cramps.

Daily things like sitting too long in one spot, standing on hard and flat floors and even poor posture while standing and sitting may be a factor for leg cramps.
"Enter Buoy hydration drops, the easy-to-use formula that‚Äôs designed to give you a big boost of the electrolytes and trace minerals that you need every day to feel your best."

"It's purposefully unflavored which means sugar-free, stevia, and sweetener-free"
‚ÄúBuoy Daily Wellness Drops will be your latest obsession.‚Äù

settings.title: Hydration Dos and Don‚Äôts
settings.text:
‚úÖ Do incorporate Buoy into your daily routine, especially if you're frequently active or in a hot environment.

‚úÖ Do mix Buoy as directed for optimal hydration benefits.

‚úÖ Do listen to your body; if you're feeling thirsty or showing signs of dehydration, it's time to hydrate.


‚ùå Don't rely solely on Buoy; it's essential to maintain a balanced diet and drink regular water throughout the day.

‚ùå Don't exceed the recommended amount of Buoy; more isn't always better.

settings.title: Safety First
settings.text:
Buoy is crafted with natural and effective ingredients to help combat dehydration. However, everyone's body is different.

Special Considerations

If you're pregnant, nursing, or have a medical condition, it's a good idea to consult with a healthcare professional before using Buoy.

Medical Interactions

If you're on medication, check for any potential interactions with electrolyte supplements.

Seeking Medical Advice

If symptoms of dehydration persist or you experience any adverse reactions, stop using Buoy and seek medical advice. Remember, severe dehydration is a serious condition, and in such cases, it's essential to get professional medical care.

settings.title: Why Choose Buoy?
settings.text:
Hydration is the foundation of well-being. Every cell, tissue, and organ in your body relies on water to function optimally. And when it comes to maintaining that delicate balance, not all solutions are created equal. That‚Äôs where Buoy shines.

What Makes Buoy Stand Out?

‚úì Sugar Free
‚úì Stevia & Sweetener Free
‚úì No Flavors
‚úì No Calories Or Carbohydrates
‚úì NonGMO & Vegan
‚úì 3x More Bioavailable Form Factor
settings.text_bottom:
Our Commitment To Your Wellness

At Buoy, we're more than just a hydration solution‚Äîwe're your partner in health. To prove our commitment to your wellness journey, we're offering a special, limited-time promotion: Enjoy a month of Buoy risk-free! Dive deep into the world of real hydration.
settings.button_label: Claim Your Risk Free Month With Buoy!

settings.title: Dr. Lianli Li, Ph.D.
settings.title_location: President Gateway Pharmaceutical, St. Louis, Missouri
settings.content: ‚ÄúMost of us are living our lives under the optimal hydration level. Buoy gives consumers the proper hydration they need, without having to reach for a sugary, artificial sports drink.‚Äù

settings.title: Martha Rosenau
settings.content: ‚ÄúMy patients with gastrointestinal disease are truly benefiting from Buoy. They are feeling more vibrant and energetic with this amazing blend of electrolytes. Since it‚Äôs free of both sugars and zero-calorie sweetener, it‚Äôs the perfect way to rehydrate without further aggravating the gastrointestinal tract. Thank you for creating a dietitian‚Äôs dream - the perfectly balanced electrolyte replenisher, free of any form of sweetener.‚Äù

settings.title: Melissa Nohr, JD, BCHHP, CBNP
settings.content: ‚ÄúI was diagnosed with POTS a year ago and they make a point to help make daily hydration easier and more accessible to those with chronic illnesses. After using Buoy for one year as a customer, I asked to personally invest in the company.‚Äù

settings.text: BOARD OF HEALTH PROFESSIONALS
settings.sub-text: Consisting of scientists, researchers, pharmaceutical experts, and health professionals, our board of health professionals continue to challenge and uphold us and our products to the highest standards.

settings.title: Why is simply drinking water sometimes not enough to combat dehydration?
settings.answer: Dehydration isn‚Äôt just about water loss. It‚Äôs also a loss of essential salts and minerals called electrolytes. Just drinking water won‚Äôt replace these vital nutrients and can actually dilute them, which can seriously impact your health.

settings.title: How do electrolytes play a role in the body‚Äôs hydration process?
settings.answer: Electrolytes balance fluid inside and outside of our cells, ensuring our muscles and nerves function correctly. They‚Äôre essential for maintaining hydration at a cellular level.

settings.title: What makes Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte solution different from regular hydration drinks?
settings.answer:
Many other electrolyte products are filled with added sugars, artificial colors, and unnecessary flavors, which can spike your blood sugar levels and offer little to no actual hydration benefits. These additives can also be detrimental to overall health over time.

Buoy, on the other hand, is crafted with high-quality, natural ingredients and none of those unhealthy additives, ensuring you get pure hydration. Moreover, its formulation is more bioavailable, meaning your body absorbs and utilizes it more efficiently, making Buoy a superior choice for genuine hydration and mineral replenishment.

settings.title: Can I use Buoy‚Äôs electrolytes for everyday hydration or just during severe dehydration?
settings.answer: You can use Buoy's electrolytes for both daily hydration maintenance and during times of severe dehydration.

settings.title: How quickly can I expect to feel rehydrated after using Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte products?
settings.answer: While individual experiences may vary, most users feel rehydrated and refreshed within minutes to hours, depending on the level of dehydration.

settings.title: Are there any artificial additives or sugars in Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte solutions?
settings.answer: No, Buoy's electrolyte solutions prioritize natural ingredients without artificial additives or sugars.

settings.title: How does dehydration impact the body‚Äôs overall electrolyte balance?
settings.answer: Dehydration can lead to an imbalance where there's either too much or too little of essential electrolytes, affecting muscle function, pH balance, and overall bodily processes.

settings.title: How do I know if I'm dehydrated?
settings.answer:
One of the easiest ways to tell if you're dehydrated is by the color of your pee.

The colors of your pee can range from clear to a dark amber. If you're dehydrated, your pee will be a noticeable yellow or amber color.

An additional method to test how hydrated your are is assessing your skin elasticity. Pinch the skin on your wrist and then let go. If your skin takes a second to return to normal, you may be dehydrated.

settings.title: What to do if I'm dehydrated?
settings.answer:
Once dehydrated, water alone is not enough. Drinking an electrolyte-infused beverage is key to replenishing lost electrolyte levels and balancing your fluids.

Buoy's electrolyte drops are a quick, easy way to rehydrate with any beverage you're drinking.

settings.title: Can I drink your electrolyte drinks while pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.answer:
Yes!

Electrolytes and trace minerals are key nutrients that are essential to all cycles of pregnancy, from pre- to postpartum.

Pregnant and breastfeeding women can significantly benefit by incorporating a clean electrolyte supplement into their diets.

With any new supplement, we always recommend checking with your healthcare team or doctor.

settings.title: Can children drink your electrolyte drinks?
settings.answer:
Yes!

All Buoy electrolyte drops are safe and effective for children.

Buoy contains only essential electrolytes and trace minerals important for every cell and system in our bodies, especially key for children as these nutrients are often missing in our diets.

Other electrolytes contain high sugar and sweetener counts, artifical colors and additives and other inflammatory ingredients.

settings.title: Do your electrolyte drinks contain caffeine?
settings.answer:
Hydration Drops and Immunity Drops do not contain any caffeine.

Only our Energy Drops contain a small amount of caffeine sourced from the potent health compounds in green tea.

settings.title: How long do the effects of your electrolyte drinks last?
settings.answer:
Buoy electrolytes are a great option for short-term relief with their fast-acting, bioavailable form factor. For results within a day or two, you can help prevent leg cramps, headaches, fatigue and more.

Use consistently for transformative, long lasting benefits.

settings.title: Are your electrolyte drinks vegan?
settings.answer:
Yes!

Buoy's electrolytes and minerals are ethically sourced from the ocean and our antioxidants and vitamins are plant-powered.

Our electrolyte drops contain no animal byproduct.

settings.title: Do you offer bulk orders or subscriptions for your drinks?
settings.answer:
Yes!

If you need to stock up, 9 Bottle Packs are available for one-time purchases and subscription to save an additional 24%.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your electrolyte drinks?
settings.answer:
Buoy electrolyte drops are shelf stable over a year.

After opening, we suggest using within two months.

settings.title: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
settings.answer:
Unlock 24% off Buoy when you subscribe to monthly deliveries. Your discount and Free Shipping applies to every order. Cancel anytime, even after yoru first order.

If it's not for you, get a full refund.

settings.title: Can I find your drinks in stores?
settings.answer:
Yes! Buoy is nationwide in CVS, Walgreens and boutique natural grocers across the country.

Check our store locator to find the closest stores to you or order directly from our site.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
Buoy offers a 30 day money back guarantee on all of our products purchased through our website so you can try it risk free in your routine to see if it's a good fit.

If it's not for you, get a full refund no questions asked.
